name: reddit Dark Pastel (For RES Night Mode)
description:
THE HEXES USED IN THIS THEME ARE FROM AND INSPIRED BY A REDDIT SYNC THEME BY /u/dudinacas. YOU CAN SEE THE THREAD HERE: https://redd.it/6fjms0. 

ALSO NOTE THAT THIS WILL NOT WORK WITH THE UPCOMING REDESIGN. I WILL CONTINUE WORKING ON THIS FOR LEGACY USERS THOUGH.

I originally gave up making this theme when I deleted my old reddit account, but decided to keep working on it after I realized that I prefer this color pallet over the actual RES Dark Theme color.

I recommend turning on  autoColorUsernames in RES (under https://www.reddit.com/prefs/#res:settings/userHighlight), and checking "Random color, not too bright, consistent for each user) just for aesthetics.
additional_info:
0.5: Big Bang
1.0: fixed the theme for the new profiles
1.5: fixed the theme for the new profiles again
1.5.5: fixed the theme for the new profiles again, again.
2.0: i really dislike the multireddit side bar on the left and i find that it bloats the front page so i made a userstyle that removes that, so i completely forgot to recolor that. thats fixed now.
2.0.1: fixed the sidebar text color
2.0.2: fixed karma break down on new profiles
2.1: fixed the text color on new new profiles again
2.1.1: fixed "MY SUBREDDITS" color
2.1.2: fixed the selected post/comment highlight color
2.1.3: Fixed the theme on the new profiles. HOWEVER, I couldn't find a way to color the header. Oh welllllll.....
